snippet.title: PowerWash Simulator | Cruise Ship Summer Seasonal Trailer
snippet.description:
The next stop on our Washer-Versary trip is here with the Cruise Ship! Rinse down a dirty deck and enjoy the summer sun in this free seasonal job. 

More to come very soon as our Washer-Versary celebrations continue...

The Cruise Ship is available August 1st on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series S|X, Xbox One, Windows, and Steam

Play PowerWash Simulator on Steam here: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1290000  

For more pressure washing goodness, subscribe to our channel!

Follow our Twitter for daily satisfying content: https://bit.ly/TwitterPWS

Join the conversation on our Discord: https://discord.gg/powerwashsimulator

Follow us on TikTok for quick-spray socials: https://bit.ly/PWSTikTok
